lead_paragraph: The footage North Korea has broadcast of what looked like a successful submarine-launched ballistic missile was most likely faked to exaggerate the country’s advances in missile development

headline.print_headline: North Korea Faked Test Video, Group Says
headline.main: North Korea Faked Test Video, Group Says

snippet: The footage North Korea has broadcast of what looked like a successful submarine-launched ballistic missile was most likely faked to exaggerate the country’s advances in missile development
abstract: Analysts say North Korea likely faked missile test video to exaggerate country’s advances in missile development.
